attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: i downloaded this app and within MINUTES my phone began to glitch. i couldn’t open any of my apps except this one. it made my phone very laggy. my battery now goes down WAY quicker than before. Disgusting.

attributes.title: ATROCIOUS.
attributes.review: this app is terrible!! it took forever to download and it is just awful. the whole app just bugs and glitches and does not work. it’s so awful. no one download this app. it’s so bad and terribly organized and functions TERRIBLE. god no one download this.

attributes.title: ridiculous.
attributes.review: if i could give this app 0 stars, i would. it took me the entire day to download this app, several hours. and now that i have it there is NOTHING GOOD ABOUT IT AT ALL. i'm extremely infuriated and disappointed, but i shouldn't be surprised.

attributes.title: Bad
attributes.review: I am so sick of this app. I tried to download it to see what all of the fuss is about, and when I did, I immediately started getting calls that told me if I didn’t have my parents vote for trump in 2020 that they would kill me. Im so sick of hearing it. Bad app.

attributes.title: This app destroyed my phone
attributes.review: I didn't even download this app but it somehow appeared on my phone. Then the entire keyboard turned to Russian characters and I started get mysterious charges to my credit card for subscriptions to golden shower porn sites.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE DO NOT DOWNLOAD!
attributes.review: Okay so first of all, do not download. It will get your IP AFTER YOU ENTER YOUR EMAIL. This is clearly unacceptable. But they won’t break into your house. But they will AND STEAL HALF OF YOUR MONEY EVERY SINGLE MONTH. Do NOT download this. This is ✨🦋 t h e w o r s t a p p 🦋✨ so please i just recommend to not download this app. Very unacceptable! 😡😡😡😡🤬🤬😡🤬😡🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬

attributes.title: All around bad. 🎉💙👏🏾😷
attributes.review: I got this app to see if it would give me any viable and useful information and I got none at all. I think that this app needs to be removed or recreated to make sure the news is correct and not bias.

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: This app took 2 weeks to load and when it did my phone became so glitching that I couldn’t even work and I had to get it fix I wish I could give this app 0 stars this unbelievable🙄😤

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: This app causes my pasta to burn in the pot I couldn’t believe what I saw when I looked at the pasta after it burned I saw what no one should have to see DONALD TRUMPS FACE it was traumatizing I’m going to possibly sue whoever let me look like that I’m so sorry if anyone else has had to deal with this

attributes.title: Messed up!
attributes.review: I am so upset that this app isn’t better! As soon as I opened the app I had to sign away all my data and my human rights!!!!! Along with that, my phone totally glitches out everytime i open the app and crashes.
